item.title: Neeed help
item.dc:creator: @princess101 princess101
item.description:
@princess101 wrote:

hi i need help in commands in 508 server i hope some one help me not see the topic then dont help…
i need to add “giveadmin” commands and “givemod” and “demote” and i hope i find “kick” commands i got commands for

giveadmin but when i put it send error i wanna to see if it right and if they right tell me where to put, cuz evrytime error.
here
“giveadmin”

} } if (cmd[0].equals("giveadmin")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 2; p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Administrator by " + p.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true;

“givemod”

} } if (cmd[0].equals("givemod")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 1; p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to Moderator by " + p.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true;

“demote”

} } if (cmd[0].equals("demote")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.rights = 0; p2.frames.sendMessage(p2, "You have been Demoted by " + p.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true;

and
“kick”

dunno lol...

i wish i get some few help… bye replay please.

Read full topic
